title: Fixes visibility problem and adds fade-in
body_html:
As @ramonh was noting correctly, I did make a nice opacity fade-out, but the link kept on being invisibly clickable on top once you resized the screen. Oh, when will the day come I'll merge a PR without having to fix something after? 😞

Well, this one fixes it indeed! And adds a fade-in to match the fade-out. Hurray for fixing things!
